name: Phase Dash!
description:
A short and challenging platformer inspired by Sunblaze and Celeste! Except there's a twist: once per level, you can phase through (most) objects!

If you manage to collect the 25 cubes in a chapter, you unlock the chapter's hardmode, in which you can't dash!

Here are the controls:

ActionsKeyboardControllerMovementArrow KeysD-PadJumpZADashXXPhaseCR1RestartRSelectPauseEscapeStart
